name: analytics
title: Google Analytics API
description: Views and manages your Google Analytics data.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

methods.name: get
methods.desc: Returns Analytics report data for a view (profile).

requiredQueryParams.name: ids
requiredQueryParams.desc: Unique table ID for retrieving report data. Table ID is of the form ga:XXXX, where XXXX is the Analytics view (profile) ID.

requiredQueryParams.name: start-date
requiredQueryParams.desc: Start date for fetching report data. All requests should specify a start date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

requiredQueryParams.name: end-date
requiredQueryParams.desc: End date for fetching report data. All requests should specify an end date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

requiredQueryParams.name: metrics
requiredQueryParams.desc: A comma-separated list of Analytics metrics. E.g., 'ga:sessions,ga:pageviews'. At least one metric must be specified to retrieve a valid Analytics report.

optinalQueryParams.name: dimensions
optinalQueryParams.desc: A comma-separated list of Analytics dimensions. E.g., 'ga:browser,ga:city'.

optinalQueryParams.name: max-results
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of entries to include in this feed.

optinalQueryParams.name: sort
optinalQueryParams.desc: A comma-separated list of dimensions or metrics that determine the sort order for the report data.

optinalQueryParams.name: filters
optinalQueryParams.desc: A comma-separated list of dimension or metric filters to be applied to the report data.

optinalQueryParams.name: segment
optinalQueryParams.desc: An Analytics advanced segment to be applied to the report data.

optinalQueryParams.name: start-index
optinalQueryParams.desc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists all accounts to which the user has access.

optinalQueryParams.name: max-results
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of accounts to include in this response.

optinalQueryParams.name: start-index
optinalQueryParams.desc: An index of the first account to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists goals to which the user has access.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: Account ID to retrieve goals for. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts that user has access to.

pathParams.name: webPropertyId
pathParams.desc: Web property ID to retrieve goals for. Can either be a specific web property ID or '~all', which refers to all the web properties that user has access to.

pathParams.name: profileId
pathParams.desc: View (Profile) ID to retrieve goals for. Can either be a specific view (profile) ID or '~all', which refers to all the views (profiles) that user has access to.

optinalQueryParams.name: max-results
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of goals to include in this response.

optinalQueryParams.name: start-index
optinalQueryParams.desc: An index of the first goal to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists views (profiles) to which the user has access.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: Account ID for the views (profiles) to retrieve. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts to which the user has access.

pathParams.name: webPropertyId
pathParams.desc: Web property ID for the views (profiles) to retrieve. Can either be a specific web property ID or '~all', which refers to all the web properties to which the user has access.

optinalQueryParams.name: max-results
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of views (profiles) to include in this response.

optinalQueryParams.name: start-index
optinalQueryParams.desc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists advanced segments to which the user has access.

optinalQueryParams.name: max-results
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of advanced segments to include in this response.

optinalQueryParams.name: start-index
optinalQueryParams.desc: An index of the first advanced segment to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.

methods.name: list
methods.desc: Lists web properties to which the user has access.

pathParams.name: accountId
pathParams.desc: Account ID to retrieve web properties for. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts that user has access to.

optinalQueryParams.name: max-results
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of web properties to include in this response.

optinalQueryParams.name: start-index
optinalQueryParams.desc: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter.
